document_title: Heart valve disease: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
Symptoms commonly seen in patients are: (3)
Difficulty breathing: This condition often occurs even when the patient lies down to rest, causing them to sleep with pillows elevated to make it easier to breathe.; Weakness or dizziness: The patient does not have enough strength to perform daily activities. Sometimes, they feel dizzy and dizzy to the point of losing consciousness; Chest discomfort: The patient feels pressure or heaviness in the chest during activity or when exposed to cold air.; Palpitations: This symptom makes the patient feel like a fast heartbeat, irregular heartbeat, skipped beats or the feeling of the heart beating haphazardly in the chest.; Swelling of the ankles, feet or abdomen (edema).; Rapid weight gain: Patients can gain more than 1kg in just one day.
